attributes.action: Grant Scotland and Wales and Northern Ireland Referendums on independence
attributes.additional_details: All 3 nations are being dragged out of the EU against their wishes.  They are being totally ignored and disrespected by the Government.
attributes.background:
I'm a strong believer in the union.  Sadly the PM has destroyed the union.  I believe that Scotland,Wales and Northern Ireland should be granted independence referendums.

I believe we'll see a unified Ireland in the next 10-15 years as well as an independent Scotland, possibly Wales too
